page.title: 10OULTONLOWE FARM
page.content: This farm is owned by{Mr.and Mrs.R. {Hales.}It is a{Dairy Farm}of 227 acres divided into 17 fields.Mr.Hales employs two other workers to help him to look after the 150 milking cows and 100 calves and heifers which he has in his fields. About half his cattle are {Friesian,}the other,{British Holstein. Occasionally Mr.Hales visits{Beeston and{Crewe Cattle Markets. The{Milk Quota}for this farm this year is 840,000 litres. Mr. Hales is a keen{conservationist. He has set aside a small area of land, through which a stream flows,and here he maintains a protected area for wildlife as well as the various birds which he rears.
